imdb.plot outline: These days, a home's living space stretches way beyond the inside of your house. Jason Russell and his talented crew are taking backyards to the next level in Tacoma, WA. From creative curves and custom themes, to fully automated tricked-out seating areas, if you can dream it, The Deck Doctor can build it.
imdb.title: The Deck Doctor
plot: These days, a home's living space stretches way beyond the inside of your house. Jason Russell and his talented crew are taking backyards to the next level in Tacoma, WA. From creative curves and custom themes, to fully automated tricked-out seating areas, if you can dream it, _The Deck Doctor_ (qv) can build it.::Darryl Silver
